name: directorist-gutenberg/listing-card-badge-popular
title: Listing Badge Popular
description: Displays the popular badge of the listing

block_width.description: Block width is used to set the width of the block in percentage

textAlign.description: Text alignment is used to set the alignment of the text in the block

text.description: Text is used to set the text of the block

text_color.description: Text color is used to set the color of the text in hex format

background_color.description: Background color is used to set the background color of the block in hex format
